summary: The story of the Hakoah Vienna Jewish womens swim team of the 1930s, their forced separation, and their reunion decades later.
cast: Hanni Lux|Judith Haspel|Anni Lampl|Elisheva Susz|Trude Hirschler|Greta Stanton|Nanne Selinger|Ann Marie Pisker|Boris Eder|Florian Schäfer|Rudi Luksch|Gerhard Heger|Fritz von Friedl|Sandra Bohle|Stefanie Dvorak|Yaron Zilberman
title: Watermarks
